maqras.text: Kiya issay who waqat maloom nahi jabb qabron mein jo kuch hy nikal liya jaey ga
Aur seenon ki poshida batein zahir kerdi jaeingi
Be-shak inka rab uss din unkay haal say poora ba-khabar hoga
Kharkhara deney wali
Kiaya hy who kharkhara deney wali
Tujhay kiya maloom kay who kharkhara deney wali kia hy
Jiss din insan bikhray huye perwanon ki tarah hojaeyen gy
Aur pahar dhunay huye rangeen oon ki tarah hojaein gay
phir jiss kay palry bhari hongy
Who to dilpasand aram ki zindagi mein hoga
Aur jiss kay palry halky hongy
uss ka thikana Laaviya hai
Tujhy kia maloom kay yeh kiya hai
woh Tand-o-tez aag (hai)
Zeyadti ki chahat nay tumhein ghafil kerdia
Yahan tak kay tum qabastan ja phunchy
Hergiz nahi tum unqareeb maloom kerlogay
Hergiz nahi phir tumhein jald ilm hojaey ga
Hergiz nahi ager tum yaqeeni tor per jan lo
To be-shak tum jahanum dekhlogay
Aur tum ussy yaqeen ki aankh say dekhlogy
Phir uss din tum say zarror bil-zaroor nematon ka sawal hoga
Zamaney ki qasam
Beyshak (bil-yaqeen)insane sir ta sir nuqsan mein hay
Siwaey un logon kay jo eman laey aur nek amal kiey aur(jinhon nay)apas mein haq ki waseeyat ki aur aik doosry ko sabar ki naseehat ki
Bari kharabi hai her aisy shaks ki jo aib tatolney wala geebat kerney wala ho
Jo maal ko jama kerta jaey or ginta jaey
Woh samjhta hy kay uska maal usky pass sada rahay ga
Hergiz nahi yeh to zaroor tor phor denay wali aag mein phenk diya jaeyga
Aur tujhey kia maloom kay asi aag kiya hogi
Woh Allah Taalaa ki sulgai hoi aag hogi
Jo dilon per charhti chali jaey gi
Who unn per her taraf say band ki hui hogi
Bary bary satoonon mein
Kia tu nay na dekha kay tery rab nay hathi walon kay sath kia kiya
Kia unkay maker ko beykar nai kerdia
Aur unper parindon kay jhond kay jhond bhej diey
Jo unhein mitti or pather ki kankariyan mar rahy thy
Pus unhein khaye huye bhoosy ki tarah kerdiya
Quresh kay manoos kerney kay liye
(yanni) unhen jary aur garmi kay safar say manoos kerney kay liey.(uskay shukriey main)
Pus unhen chahey kay issi gher kay rab ki ibadat kerty rahen
Jiss nay inhen bhook mein khana diya aur darr (aur khof) mein aman (o-aman) diya
Kiya tu nay(ussay bhi)dekha jo (roz) jaza ko jhutlata hai
yehi who hai jo yateem ko dhakkay deta hai
Aur miskeen ko khilaney ki targeeb nahi deta
Un namazion kay liey afsos(aur well nami jahanum ki jagah)hai
Jo apni namaz say ghafil hain
Jo riya kari kerty hein
Aur baratnay ki chez roktay hain
Yaqeenan hum nay tujhay (hoz)kusar (aur bhat kuch) diya hay
Pus tu apney rab kay liey namz parh aur qurbani karo
Yaqeenan tera dushman hi la-waris aur benam-o-nishan hai
Aap khydijey kay aey kafiro
Na mein ibadat kerta hun usski jiss kit um ibadat kerty ho
Na tum ibadat kerney waly ho usski jisski mein ibadat kerta hon
Aur na mein ibadat karon ga uski jisski tum ibadat kerty ho
Aur na tum usski ibadat kerney waly hojisski mein ibadat ker raha hon
Tumhary liey tumhara deen hai aur mery liey mera deen hai
Jab Allah ji madad aur fatah ajaye
Aur tu logon ko ALLAH kay deen mein jok dar jok aata dekh lay
To apnay rabb ki tasbeeh karney lag hamd kay sath aur uss say maghfirat ki dua maang bey shak woh bara hi tauba qabool karney wala hai
Abu Lahab ky dono hath toot gaye aur who (khud) halk ho gaya
Na to uska maal usky kaam aya aur na uski kamai
Who unqareeb bharkney waali aag mein jaey ga
Aur uski biwi bhi(jaeygi)jo lakriyan dhonay waali hai
usski gardan mein post khajoor ki bati hui rassi hogi
Aap kehydijiye kay Woh ALLAH TaALA aik(hi)hai
Allah bey niaz hai
Na uss say koi paida hoa na who kisi say paida hoa
Aur na koi uska humser hai
Aap kehdijiye! Kay mein subha ky Rab ki panah mein aata hun
Her uss cheez ky shar say jo uss nay paida ki hai
Aur andheri raat ki tareki kay shar say jab uska andhera phel jaye
Aur girah(laga ker inn)mein phonknay walon kay sher say(bhi)
Aur hasad kerney waly ki burai say bhi jab wo hasad karey
Aap kehdijiey!kay mein logo kay parwardigar ki panah mein ata hun
Logon ky malik ki(aur)
Logon ky maabood ki(Panah mein)
Waswasa dalney waly pechy hut janey waly kay shar say
Jo logon kay seenon mein waswasa daalta hai
(Khua) woh jinn mein say ho ya insaan mein say
